commit.message:
gcc-bug-i.c: Add little endian variant.

2013-10-28  Bill Schmidt  <wschmidt@linux.vnet.ibm.com>

	* gcc.dg/vmx/gcc-bug-i.c: Add little endian variant.
	* gcc.dg/vmx/eg-5.c: Likewise.
